first-step.title: APPLICATION
first-step.youngSpecialistsCount: Number of young specialists to be trained and employed:
first-step.economicJustificationTitle: Economic justification of the target loan
first-step.ownFundsAmount: Own funds raised for project implementation (UZS):
first-step.organizationSocialIndicators: Information on the organization’s social performance indicators:
first-step.applicantQuestionnaireLabel: Document confirming the right to carry out educational activities (license/confirmation/permit);

second-step.title: Founding Documents
second-step.foundersDecisionToOpenOrganization: Founders’ decision to open the organization
second-step.foundersDecisionOnTargetLoan: Founders’ decision on providing a target loan (loan amount, purpose, term, interest rate, collateral);
second-step.orderOnTargetLoan: Order on allocation of target loan (loan amount, purpose, term, interest rate, collateral)
second-step.ceoAuthorityConfirmation: Documents confirming the authority of the director
second-step.chiefAccountantAuthorityConfirmation: Documents confirming the authority of the chief accountant
second-step.itParkResidencyCertificate: Residency certificate of LLC 'Technological Park of Software Products and IT' (IT Park);
second-step.educationActivityPermission: Document confirming the right to carry out educational activities (license/confirmation/permit);

third-step.title: Financial Documents
third-step.financialStatements: Copies of the organization’s financial statements for the last year (by quarters), as required by current legislation of the Republic of Uzbekistan for quarterly, semi-annual and annual reports, with confirmation of submission to the tax authority; Form-1, Form-2, account turnover
third-step.taxDebtAbsenceCertificate: Certificate from the tax authority on the absence of tax arrears;
third-step.bankAccountCertificate: Certificate from banks about the availability of accounts, indicating the absence of file No.2 (original dated no more than 30 days);
third-step.targetFundSpendingEstimate: Estimate of targeted spending of funds
third-step.leaseAgreement: Lease agreement (if the organization rents premises);

fourth-step.title: Real Estate
fourth-step.landCadastrePassport: Cadastral passport for land plot (buildings and structures) provided as collateral
fourth-step.realEstateValuationReport: Report of an independent valuation organization
fourth-step.vehicleValuationReport: Report of an independent valuation organization
fourth-step.shareholderResolution: Resolution of the general meeting of participants/shareholders
fourth-step.insuranceCompanyLetter: Letter from the insurance company regarding the obligation under the loan.

new.message: Your application has not yet been submitted for review.

consideration.header: Done! Your application has been successfully submitted
consideration.message: Your application has been successfully created and is under review. Please wait for verification.

rejected.message: Your application has been reviewed, but unfortunately we have to reject it.
rejected.description: Your application was rejected due to existing debts. To proceed, you must settle all debts and provide supporting documents.

correction.message: Your application has been reviewed, but some corrections are needed. Please clarify the following information.
correction.description: During the review, inconsistencies were found in the submitted data. To proceed, please resubmit a copy of the director’s passport (photo page) and the organization’s charter with up-to-date information.

final-consideration.message: Your application is under final review. Please wait for the decision.

final-rejected.message: Unfortunately, your application has been finally rejected after review.

final-correction.message: Final corrections are required. Please review the specified information.

approved.message: The application has been fully approved and is ready for issuance.
approved.description: Please review the agreement before receiving the funds.
